description: This file declares the IController interface within the WPEFramework's PluginHost namespace. It defines virtual methods for controlling a device or application, including persisting state, deleting resources, rebooting, and managing environment and configuration data.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface defining control operations for a device or application within WPEFramework.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource specified by path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the environment variable identified by index.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets the configuration associated with a callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Clones a configuration from a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
